attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call for the dissolution of the Black Policeman's Federation.

All policemen should belong to the same union.

Yours 


Peter Fallon.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, not an incomprehensible word such as "DisBlackPolFed".
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
